events.EventName: Bestbeat Belgrade's Beatles Tribute At Fest
events.EventDescription:
Od podruma Cavern kluba – do krova zgrade Apple-a, the Bestbeat vas vode na magično putovanje kroz šezdesete i muziku najvećeg benda XX veka. Svojim dvoipočasovnim programom od preko 60 pesama liverpulskih buba, prvi beogradski the Beatles tribute band ne ostavlja ravnodušnim ni najtvrdokornije the Beatles fanove. Nastupajući u klubovima, pozorištima, koncertnim dvoranama, na festivalima i gradskim trgovima, ovaj kvartet pronosi poruku ljubavi, mira i razumevanja koju su milionima slušalaca širom sveta pre više od četiri decenije podarili John, Paul, George i Ringo. Svima onima koji veruju da All You Need Is Love, the Bestbeat poručuje: We hope you will enjoy the show! 
Ulaz 400 dinara 
Info /rezervacije 063 700 81 50

*** HUMANITARNI KONCERT ZA SNEŽU KAURIN***

Snežani Kaurin i njenoj porodici potrebna je vaša pomoć! Dođite 25.januara u Klub Fest da im zajedno pomognemo! 

Nastupaju: Nemesis, The Bite, Raskid13 i Zoos. 
Ulaz: 300 dinara 

*********************************************************************

Snezana Kaurin je živela u Zemunu  u ulici Filipa Višnjića sa majkom i dve ćerke, Janjom i Marijom. Snežina starija ćerka Janja je ometena u razvoju. Bila je staratelj svom bivšem mužu, koji je psihički oboleo, i koji je potpisao punomoć Janji da sa svojom pratnjom može da živi u njegovoj kući na Konjarniku a za koje su socijalni radnici nedavno rekli da nije vise validno jer je overeno u psihijatrijskoj bolnici u zatvoru.
Sneža se razbolela, kukovi su joj stradali i pala je u krevet skoro nepokretna, a njena majka je zajedno sa ometenom Janjom izbacila iz stana u stan u podrumu. Snežinu mladju cerku zadržala uz sebe i zabranila da vidja majku i sestru.
 Kako nisu imale nikakva primanja, racuni su se gomilali I ostajali neplaceni. Jedini prihod koji imaju su Janjini honorari od ucestvovanja na snimanju emisija koje traje po 10-15h za koja je dobijala 1000din i Snežini obilasci bolesne bake jednom nedeljno. Da bi sprecila dalje gomilanje racuna, Snezanina majka je nju i Janju odjavila sa adrese na koju su prijavljene i rekla im da se isele iz podruma. To je napravilo dugi niz dodatnih problema sto se tice zdravstvenog osiguranja ubuduce, a koje neophodno zbog operacije na koju Sneza ceka vec 5 godina.
Jedan od takodje velikih problema koji su je zadesili je i greska zdravstvenog radnika koji je umesto trenutne adrese ubelezio staru adresu I na taj nacin je propustila operaciju koja bi je vratila na noge I na posao…
Pored novca koji im je potreban za osnovne stvari, Snezani je takodje i potrebna pumpica jer je astmaticar, kao i lekovi (akroksin je najskuplji) koji joj pomazu da se koliko toliko krece. A sve to mnogo kosta.
Ona kao staratelj lica nesposobnog za rad ne dobija nikakvu pomoc. Sada zive u kuci na Konjarniku u koju su usle samovoljno i nepropisno i postoji bojazan da ih izbace i odatle jer Sneza vise nije staratelj nad bivsim muzem nego drzava, a punomoc koju je on potpisao smatraju nevalidnom. U kuci nemaju nista sem jednog malog kreveta na kom obe spavaju.

Da bi se sprecio jos jedan tragican kraj price, ovoj porodici potreban je novac za hranu i osnovne potrepstine, i kako bi se dug za struju otplatio, kupio osnovni namestaj i na neki nacin obezbedila topla voda. Sneza nakon operacije planira da se vrati na posao, a do tad potrebna je svaka vrsta pomoci.

>>> CRVENI KARTON - LIVE <<<
- Subota 27. januar
- Start 22h
- Ulaz 200 rsd
- Rezervacije na tel. 069/1982286
 _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
Za njih svi muzički kritičari i portali u glas jednoglasno kažu da su jedni od predvodnika nove generacije srpskih bendova.�Svakog vikenda od grada do grada, čuje se“ Glas” novog vremena koji promovišu momci iz Kruševca. �Koncertno sigurno jedan od najaktivnijih , najsmelijih i najtraženijih mlađih bendova u Srbiji, sa preko  70  koncerta godišnje, posle putovanja po raznim gradovima Srbije i regiona  i nedavne pobede  na BARF festu , po prvi put dolaze u ZAPPA – barku  27. januara.� Crveni karton dolazi baš u pravo vreme, kada lokalne i regionalne novine, internet portali i ostali mediji previše promovišu bogate klince Instagrama, samoproklamovane „zvezde“, bahate bogataše i njima slične kreature modernog društva. �Pesme su ohrabrujuće, obećavajuće i govore o receptu za bolji i uspešniji život u sve više demoralisanom društvu.�„Buđenje“ se ubrazano širi svuda na Balkanu . Crveni karton je postao glas nove generacije i možda njihova poslednja nada. Njihovi nastupi su unapred rezervisani po nekoliko meseci i trenutno su bend  koji je imao  najviše nastupa na rokenrol sceni  u prethodnoj godini i tako će biti dokle god ih drži i jača slogan :
"Za bolje sutra,�da zaboravim na juče,�da danas živim kako bi trebalo..."
Ovog leta bend je nastupio na Arsenal festu, druge večeri na Garden stage-u, BARF  fest,  Drum dum festu, na festivalu Prnjavor stock, Overload fest , 035 FEST u Jagodini, festivalu “ Osvežene” u Pirotu, Karnevalu u Vrnjackoj banji , Veliko gradiškoj gitarijadi, Kuršumlijskoj gitarijadi, na festival Vračar Rocks, Pank paradi u Požegi i drugim značajnim festivalima u regionu.
�Jer, Crveni karton će dobiti svako ko je to zaista zaslužio.

Veliki povratak heroja undergrounda!!! Dodjite da zajedno shizimo!!!
Zaz i Boki iz grupe Triko ponovo biraju atmosferične indie hitove za posetioce Zaokreta. Dođite i čujte šta su novo otkrili i čega su se starog setili.

The man behind the classic "Peace of Mind" visits Drugstore. 

LINEUP
Claro Intelecto
Regen
Marko Milosavljević

Mark Stewart of Manchester introduced his moniker Claro Intelecto to the world with his ’Peace of Mind’ EP in 2003. His unique take on techno and house, coated in dub, comes as a result of meeting his first synth at the age of ten, learning piano, constant experimenting with sequencers, Octamed, Akais and Rolands. Ai Records were the first to release Claro Intelecto in 2003. With his critically acclaimed album Metanarrative, released on Modern Love, that made it to Resident Advisor’s Top 20 albums of 2008, Mark gained new audience worldwide. He also remixed Depeche Mode’s 1982 classic „Leave in Silence“ in 2011 and it was Martin Gore who ordered the remix. Last November, Claro Intelecto released „Exhiliator“ album on Delsin. 

https://soundcloud.com/clarointelecto 

Supported by 
Regen | https://soundcloud.com/regenen
Marko Milosavljević | https://www.mixcloud.com/markom/

TICKETS info to be announced soon.

“Trough someone else's heart leads the right path, who travels differently finds only darkness.”
– Branko Miljković

On their first party in 2018. at club Drugstore Beograd, Music Reactions organization will present Hungarian DJ duo – DORK and ISU to Belgrade audience. These local DJ legends are residents of Budapest equivalent to our “techno cathedral” – club LÄRM. They are also founders of Technokunst organization whose name describes it the best – techno art. 

Technokunst is an organization but also the biggest international techno club project in Budapest. It main distinction from other projects are innovative and bold bookings – from rising stars to techno titans. These are just a few of names that DORK and ISU presented inside their project: Ben Klock, Cari Lekebusch, Terence Fixmer, Dave Clarke, Ben Sims, Luke Slater, Marcel Dettmann, Oscar Mulero, Rebekah, Stanislav Tolkachev, Ø [PHASE], Perc, I Hate Models, SNTS, Tommy Four Seven, Voiski (Live), Etapp Kyle…

DORK – Among first generation of Hungarian DJs, Dork has been using music and record players as a means of non-verbal communication since 1996. She makes the valuable dimensions of the style evident by moving along the powerful yet meditative boundary of her human-centered techno.

ISU – In 2010, with acknowledged fine artist DJ Dork, he looks for a new platform to share their ideas on techno: Technokunst comes to life with the expressed aim of bringing quality - instead of commercial - techno back to Hungary. In Budapest's only stable and quality club that thinks "differently", the belly of the A38 ship and Lärm.

On this night, along side Technokunst Dj’s, we will have the chance to hear Music reactions residents RAR and Betomeng. 

Ticket info TBA soon. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
“Kroz tuđe srce vodi pravi put, ko drugačije putuje nailazi na tamu.”
– Branko Miljković

Na svojoj prvoj žurci 2018. u klubu Drugstore Beograd, Music recations organizacija Beogradskoj publici predstaviće dvojac iz Mađarske – DORK i ISU. Ove lokalne DJ legende su rezidenti budimpeštanskog pandana našoj “tehno katedrali” – kluba LARM i osnivači Technokunst organizacije čije ime je najbolje i opisuje – tehno umetnost. 

Technokunst je organizacija ali i najveći budimpeštanski internacionalni klubski tehno projekat koji se odlikuje inovativnim i hrabrim bukinzima – od zvezda u usponu, pa do tehno titana. Ovo su samo neki od umetnika koje su DORK i ISU u okviru svog projekta predstavili: Ben Klock, Cari Lekebusch, Terence Fixmer, Dave Clarke, Ben Sims, Luke Slater, Marcel Dettmann, Oscar Mulero, Rebekah, Stanislav Tolkachev, Ø [PHASE], Perc, I Hate Models, SNTS, Tommy Four Seven, Voiski (Live), Etapp Kyle…

DORK – Predstavnica prve generacije mađarskih didžejeva. Od 1996. godine koristi muziku i gramofone kao način izražavanja, kao sredstvo neverbalne komunikacije. Za svoj muzički stil kaže da se ne može defisati samo jednom dimenzijom i da svojom jačinom pomera granice ljudskosti. Muzikom se može sve reći, a pokretima dokazati.

ISU – Godine 2010. njegov talenat biva prepoznat od strane Dj Dork. svojim setovima stvara dimenzije moćnog ali i meditativnog zvuka koje odlikuju njegov tehno stil u čijem je centru čovek. Isu je tražio novu platformu pomoću koje bi podelio svoje viđenje tehno muzike. Rađa se projekat Technokunst sa jasnim ciljem da umesto komercijalnog u Mađarsku vrati kvalitetan tehno zvuk. 

Ove večeri zajedno sa Technokunst didžejevima nastupiće i Music Reactions rezidenti RAR i Betomeng. 

Informacije o kartama uskoro.

events.EventName: SpectraDot w/ Ben Long at Drugstore, Belgrade
events.EventDescription:
We are heading to Europe — Belgrade, Serbia to be exact — for a big SpectraDot techno showcase!

In one of world's best nightclubs Drugstore Beograd we'll be hosting a headliner from Belgium and three b2b DJ sets of our residents from Abu Dhabi and four local techno legends.

Save the date and get ready for our first showcase in Serbia with Ben Long of Space DJz!

Line up:
• Ben Long • Space Djz • Brussels, Belgium
• Parallel Mono b2b Andrew Gilpin • Abu Dhabi, UAE
• Luka Petrovic b2b Bojan Vukmirović • CONCRETE DJz • Belgrade, Serbia
• Sugar Lobby b2b TKNO • Belgrade & Požarevac, Serbia

Tickets:
• Presale at Eventim Serbia • 500 rsd
• At the door • 700 rsd

After their Big Bang with Boston 168, DJ collective TRIII is cooking more excitement at Drugstore for February 2018. 
____________________________

TRIII collective is bringing another big duo to Belgrade! This time their guests are Nick Lapien and Robin Koek better known as ARTEFAKT. 

ARTEFAKT is a result of great synergy between two Dutch producers currently residing in Berlin. Nick and Robin have established a great following all over the world after their releases on labels like Field Records, Delsin, Konstrukt and Prologue. Their first longplayer “Kinship” was released last year on Delsin. Because of their ability to use space and time in music in a unique way Artefakt easily become one of the finest techno live acts in the world. Their live setup is a real treat for those who come to the party to admire the power of various digital and analogue gear. 

Both Nick and Robin have thriving careers when apart. Lapien has visited old Drugstore in lower Kalemegdan in 2014 and party still echoes in memories of dreamy ravers. When the strong influence of the Westcoast sound of Holland scene and labels like Bunker and Crème Organisation is mixed with their shared love for ambient and what they call ‘voodoo techno’ the result is a unique take on techno genre that is beyond charming. 

Joining their perspectives in a meticulous, hands-on working method, the two bring a balanced and hypnotizing sound to the club, crystallizing in the mind and oscillating the body. What sets Artefakt apart is combination of musical material, atmosphere and groove, captivating your spirit, whether you are listening quietly on headphones, or you hear the music pounding in club.

True to their distinct mesmerising aesthetic, their music is full of suspenseful strings combined with sweeping pads and ominous tones. Artefakt represents techno rooted in aesthetics of decayed tape, musique concrete and squatting partys. 

Two engineers for resonances of machine thinking.
_____________________________

LINEUP

Big Room:
Artefakt Live
(Delsin Records, Prologue Booking, Field Records / Berlin)
Boža Podunavac - TRIII
DJ Dušan Kačarević - TRIII
Mirko Lazarevic - TRIII

Black Room:
Rajko Ristanovic-RAR / Music Reactions
Betomeng
Rope

TICKETS: Eventim Serbia
___________________________

09. decembra 2017. godine u klubu Drugstore, u režiji kolektiva TRIII, nastupiće tehno duo ARTEFAKT. Ovaj holandski dvojac, sa prebivalištem u Berlinu, čine Nick Lapien i Robin Koek.
Dobro poznati evropskoj publici, Artefakt su poslednjih nekoliko godina nastupali na gotovo svim značajnim festivalima, kao i klubovima i prostorima širom planete.
Prvo zajedničko izdanje su ubeležili za Field Records, a ubrzo nakon toga su objavili niz maxi singlova za Konstrukt, Delsin i Prologue i taj deo njihove karijere je prošle godine krunisan briljantnim albumom 'Kinship', koji predstavlja spoj njihovog iskustva stečenog kroz žive nastupe u kombinaciji sa iskustvom stečenim kroz dj karijere. Po njihovim rečima, album je baziran u okvir u kome istražuju zvučne kontraste i prelaze između prirode i urbanog okruženja kroz analogiju njihove dosadašnje studijske prakse: kao pejzaž prirode sa pobacanim oskudnim urbanim/betonskim veštačkim predmetima, naravno u zvučnom elektronskom tehno aranžmanu.
Domaća DJ podrška će biti članovi kolektiva TRIII, kao i talentovani Rope i deo Music Reactions tima RAR i Betomeng.
Prvih 200 karata po ceni od 650 rsd mogu se nabaviti na svim prodajnim mestima Eventim Serbia.

http://www.triii.rs/

events.EventName: Filip Xavi All Night Long at Drugstore
events.EventDescription:
Drugstore resident DJ Filip Xavi in an all night long episode. 

Coming from Belgrade Serbia, Filip Xavi is recognized as one of the pillars of the local contemporary techno scene and resident dj of Drugstore. As a rebel against genre/trend confinements he was always attracted to the more cerebral and darker side of techno music, manipulating with hypnotic and abstract musical structures, combining them with relentless drums which in time developed into his own recognizable style.

After appearances on several labels including his own Teskoba Recordings, in spring 2013 his first solo EP "Inline Agents" was released for "Subsist Records". November 2015 saw Filip's debut vinyl EP "Explanation Skip" (including a remix by Dasha Rush), published by Sonntag Morgen on their seventh vinyl installment, having received notable support from the main players on the techno circuit.

As Drugstore resident over the past three years he hosted and played alongside names such as: Rodhad, DVS1, Dasha Rush, Surgeon, Oscar Mulero, Phase, Dimi Angelis, Ancient Methods, Shifted, Stanislav Tolkachev, Adam X, Elektrabel, Tommy Four Seven, Blawan, Developer, and many more.

This sequence of events led to the multiple invitations to Berlin's legendary Tresor club (August 2014 and November 2015).

Filip continues to pursue his mission of taking the audience into uncharted territory of sound and space, an approach that fills the dancefloor with mystique and suspense on a path to catharsis.

His latest release "Drone Behavior" was released on Decoder Recordings in October 2017. 

TICKETS info to be announced

events.EventName: Dr. Rubinstein & Tijana T at Drugstore
events.EventDescription:
A super talented Electro warrior from Berlin meets a friend and our very own star under our roof.

LINEUP
Tijana T (Belgrade)
Dr. Rubinstein (Berlin)

Marina Rubinstein is one of the fresh faces that the larger world audience got introduced to in the past two years through her RA mix and Boiler Room appearance. Before that she has amazed Berlin’s crowd with her immaculate taste ever since she moved there in 2012. We had the opportunity to see Marina at Exit festival, not once but twice last year, the second time being the unforgettable egoless supergroup b2b2b set with Tijana T, Voiski, Francois X and Antigone, that closed the festival. You could say that Marina picks the darker side of Techno, Acid and Electro but she somehow always manages to drag it out of the mud and let it float in a very unique and super trippy spaceship of a set. The way she drops DJ Overdose’s ’Blue Flame’ at the end of her Boiler Room set would be a perfect teaser for you to get under her spell if you had only 5 minutes to get introduced to her talent. A true Electro warrior who obviously knows how the dance floor works is coming to Belgrade for the first time to meet her friend Tijana T, our very own DJ star who is at the moment on a world tour and plays all the hottest venues alongside the strongest names of electronic music. The chemistry between the two is the true reason you shouldn't miss this party. 

TICKETS info to be announced soon

events.EventName: François X presents Irregular Passion at Drugstore
events.EventDescription:
DEMENT3D presents 'Irregular Passion' tour.
François X debut album release party!

LINEUP
François X
33.10.3402
intro act by Nemanja Godjevac

Paris techno star, Drugstore resident DJ and Belgrade's favorite François X celebrates the release of his debut LP ’Irregular Passion’ which was released last November on DEMENT3D. 'Irregular Passion' wraps up the story of his three releases inspired by Blade Runner, the other two being the 2014 EP 'Suspended In A Stasis Field' and 'Unicorn Paranoia' EP from 2016.

Last time we saw our friend François X in Belgrade it was at Drugstore's garden on September 1 in an all-night-long edition. François also opened the year 2017 for us in a special 1st of January 2017 party. With his frequent visits it is obvious that you know the man and you know why he keeps coming back. 

A signing meet & greet event at Yugovinyl from 6PM precedes this party so feel free to join us there and start your weekend earlier François X presents Irregular Passion at Yugovinyl.

TICKET info to be announced soon

events.EventName: François X presents Irregular Passion at Yugovinyl
events.EventDescription:
DEMENT3D presents 'Irregular Passion' tour.
François X debut album release meet & greet event at Yugovinyl.

Paris techno star and Belgrade's favorite François X celebrates the release of his debut LP ’Irregular Passion’ which was released last November on DEMENT3D. 'Irregular Passion' wraps up the story of his three releases inspired by Blade Runner, the other two being the 2014 EP 'Suspended In A Stasis Field' and 'Unicorn Paranoia' EP from 2016.

'Irregular Passion" LP will be available for purchase and signing at Yugovinyl. The interesting thing about this event is that it will be the first ever foreign electronic music album release promo event in Serbia. 

Feel free to join us later at Drugstore for the official album release party with François X, 33.10.3402 and Nemanja Godjevac from 11PM. JOIN François X presents Irregular Passion at Drugstore.

Free entrance at Yugovinyl
TICKETS for the party at Drugstore - info to be announced soon

events.EventName: VODIM TE Na AFTER | 33.10.3402 at KPTM

events.EventDescription:
U subotu 20. januara, na perfektnom zvučnom sistemu, u renoviranom i proširenom prostoru kluba KPTM, Kolektiv TRIII najavljuje gostovanje holandskog tehno dvojca ARTEFAKT, koje je zakazano za 3./4. februar 2018. godine.

Artefakt Live presented by TRIII

Biće predstavljen deo muzičkog opusa sastava Artefakt, kao i najnovija izdanja nekoliko žanrova tehno muzike. 

Podelićemo i nekoliko karata za pomenuti događaj.

Sastanak je zakazan za 23h.

events.EventName: PARTY at Four | Teo Trunk & Kristijan Šajković at KPTM
Dancehall Friday // Young Palk live@KPTM, petak 19.1
events.EventDescription:
Po prvi put u zimskoj bašti KPTM-a zvuci Jamajke, Kariba i Afrike.

Sa ponsom vam predstavljamo DANCEHALL FRIDAY!!
Petak 19.januar od 23h,
Prvo premijerno izdanje uz nastup Young Palk-a člana DJANS ekipe. 
Rokaće se uživo hitovi poput: Burj Khalifa, Bomba, Choker i mnogi drugi....

Da bi Dancehall Friday bio poput bombe za muzičku selekciju i zarazne plesne ritmove pobrinuće se DJ Rahmanee i DJ Shone Alcapone( Couple Up.)

Ulaz je do ponoći besplatan, a nakon ponoći će se naplaćivati 200 dinara. Vidimo se u zimskoj bašti.
